  • Constructor Details

    • MainGUI

      public MainGUI(BlFacade bl)
      Constructor for the main GUI class. Sets the business logic, loads all the windows and displays the main GUI in the scene.
      Parameters:
      bl - the business logic.

  • Method Details

    • getBusinessLogic

      public BlFacade getBusinessLogic()

    • setBusinessLogic

      public void setBusinessLogic(BlFacade afi)

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()

    • load

      private Window load(String fxmlfile, String controllerFile, int width, int height) throws IOException
      Creates a new window and assigns its corresponding UI and Controller
      Parameters:
      fxmlfile - the path of the fxml resource
      controllerFile - the path to the controller's classname
      Returns:
      the new window
      Throws:
      IOException - in case loader.load() fails.

    • init

      public void init(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Initializes all the windows that do not require user authentication.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage of the project
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if any fxml file is not found

    • loadUserWindows

      public void loadUserWindows() throws IOException
      Initializes windows that require user authentication. This allows us to have current user's information available already when the window is loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if any fxml file is not found

    • loadAdminWindows

      public void loadAdminWindows() throws IOException
      Initializes windows that require admin authentication. This allows us to have current admin's information available already when the window is loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if any fxml file is not found

    • setupScene

      private void setupScene()
      Prepares the window with the navigation bar so that it is possible to navigate between windows without removing the navigation bar.

    • showScene

      private void showScene(Window window)
      Displays the given window in the scene.
      Parameters:
      window - the window.

    • goBack

      public void goBack()
      Changes the stage to the last visited window.

    • goForward

      public void goForward()
      Stores the current window in the history and displays the next window

    • goForward

      public void goForward(String title)
      Stores the current window in the history and displays the window with the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window.
